name: glidejs
description: Glide.js is a responsive and touch-friendly JavaScript slider/carousel. It’s simple, lightweight and fast. Designed to slide. No less, no more.
author: Jędrzej Chałubek <jedrzej.chalubek@gmail.com>

scripts.sass:core: node-sass assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.css && node-sass assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.sass:theme: node-sass assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.css && node-sass assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.build:css: npm run sass:core && npm run sass:theme
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
